title: Vaccine Customer Representative job in United States | jobs at Merck
description: Apply for Vaccine Customer Representative job with Merck in United States. Browse and apply for the jobs at Merck
cleaned_text: By continuing, you will be directed to a site intended only for residents of the United States and Canada. We are called MSD everywhere, except in the United States and Canada where we are known as Merck & Co., Inc., Rahway, NJ, USA. The link you have selected will take you to a third-party website, owned and operated by AgileOne. Residents of other markets, please click here. Media player About Us We are one company, but we operate under two different corporate brand names. We are known as Merck & Co.,Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States, Canada & Puerto Rico. We are known as MSD everywhere else. Hybrid work model Learn more about our hybrid work model.
